# The Longtable Feature

```{r}
library(pixiedust)
inter <- data.frame("To", "Be", "Con", "tin", "ued",
                    "", "", "", "", "", "")

x <- dust(mtcars[1:10, ]) %>% 
  redust(as.data.frame(lapply(mtcars, sum)), part = "foot") %>%
  redust(inter, part = "interfoot") %>%
  sprinkle(bg = "gray", part = "head") %>%
  sprinkle(bg = "lightgray", part = "foot") %>%
  sprinkle_print_method("html")

x
```

```{r}
x %>%
  sprinkle(longtable = 4)
```

```{r}
x %>%
  sprinkle(longtable = 4) %>%
  sprinkle_print_method("markdown")
```
